column5: So it apperes that my little girl was chosen for testing in an advanced education program 1 of 2 in her grade. I know she is a smart girl and has always pulled in top marks rite from kindergarden but wow. She loves the outdoors and is almost allways out there with me whether its camping on long weekends or fishing simcoe on the ice. I think there is somthing to be said about letting kids learn about nature at a young age. My son is 19 now and going to ryerson and has a job as well as coaches football..  Proud Dad  You BETT.
Good deal!! Must be like her mother hahahaha!!!
As you should be  Dawg.  Congratulations.  Almost made me laugh there.....Almost.
I laughed.   Way to go Don.
Good job Don (have to admit i laughed at the 'mother' comment too)
Always rewarding to know your kids are doing alright. Good parenting is key ,good for you !!!!!!!  .
